Name: Emperium
About the game: You awake in a world both unknown and dangerous. You must aid to stop an ancient threat that's awakening once more. Fight mighty beasts and collect amazing loot! Emperium is a loot focused dungeon crawling rpg with 10 unique classes and hundreds of pieces of loot. Styled after MMO's like World of Warcraft and FFXIV, Four leveling zones and 1 max level zone. - Many dungeons to explore and conquer! - Reach max level and challenge raids! That can contain 6 or more unique bosses that drop amazing loot! - An in game calendar with holidays and various other events - Own and farm your own materials, or go gather them from the open world - And much more! Plans include support for the game for at least a year after release, patches include dungeons, raids and new systems. All patch content will be free.
Meta Title: Emperium: Apr 27, 2021, Bryan Roberts and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Emperium? Check out the release date (Apr 27, 2021), developer insights from Bryan Roberts, and a complete game summary.
